Html:
Hello,

Is there a reference on how to use the StockTraderRI.ChartControls library that is included in the CAL package? It seems like it would be very useful, but the StockTrader program doesn't look like it uses all of the features of it.

Thanks,

Hi,

Prism does not provide any specific Guidance (other than the usage in the RI) on how to use these controls. You could check the WPF toolkit for more information about charting controls with WPF.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
